steps.192: Cook-Cook for 2 minutes or until the zoodles are done
steps.195: Top-Top with more parmesan if desired
steps.196: Heat-Heat a large pan on medium heat
steps.199: Add-Add 1 large minced garlic cloves to the pan
steps.202: Cook-Cook garlic until fragrant (about 1 minutes). Be careful not to burn garlic
steps.203: Spiralize-Spiralize 1 medium zucchini into thin noodles using a spiralizer
